name: Greatest Hits
title: Greatest Hits by Westlife
description: Greatest Hits is the second greatest hits album and final release by Irish boy band Westlife. It was released on 18 November 2011 by RCA Records and Sony Music. Greatest Hits is the group's second greatest hits album following Unbreakable.

songs.name: Show Me The Meaning Of Being Lonely

name: Christmas Tales
title: Christmas Tales by Alexander Rybak
description: Alexander Rybak won the Eurovision Song Contest in 2009 quite convincingly with Fairytale. His first two albums were all in English, while the last one titled Resan Till Dig was in Norwegian.
